//: [exports/./types] for TypeScript resolution - must occur first!
[main] for CJS fall-back for older versions of Node.js
[types] for Fall-back for older versions of TypeScript
name: seed-rand-syncer

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && npx tsc --project tsconfig.esm.json && npx tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json && npm run build:wrap-cjs && npm run build:wrap-esm
scripts.test: rm -rf ./test/cjs && npx tsc -t es5 -lib es2015,dom -experimentalDecorators true test/test.ts -outDir ./test/cjs && node ./tools/wrap-test && node ./test/cjs/test/test.cjs && rm -rf ./test/cjs
